title: Kan Kohhranho lungphum chu
lyrics:
Kan Kohhranho lungphum chu,
A Lal Krista Isua;
Tui leh thisen leh thuin,
A thil siam thar a ni;
A mo thianghlim ni turin,
Vana'n a rawn zawng a;
A thisen hluin a lei,
A nun nan a thi a.

Hnam tin zing ata thlante,
An zaa pumkhat si;
An chhandamna thupui chu-
Lalpa, rinna hmun khat;
Ei tur, in tur hmun khatin,
Malsawmsakin an awm,
Beiseina hmun khat umin,
Khawngaihnain a chawm.

Hmuhsitna mak tak mai chuan,
Miten hnehchhiah mah se;
Kohhran then darh leh buaina,
Lo chhuak fo thin mah se;
Mi thianghlimten ngaihvenin,
"Eng chen nge," an ti a;
Tahna zan chu, zing lawm hla
A la chang thuai dawn e.

Pa, Fa, Thlarau Thianghlim nen,
A inzawm leiah pawh;
Inpawlna thuruk nuam tak,
Hahchawlhna kim an chang,
Thianghlim leh hlimte anga,
I hnena kan chen nan:
Lalpa, i t
hat zaidamna
Ropui min pe ang che.
